amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit funds in the bill from being available for the Walter Clore Wine and Culinary Center in Prosser, Washington.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to strike the $250,000 appropriation in the bill for the Walter Clore Wine and Culinary Center in Prosser, Washington.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A018) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A018) offered by Mr. Flake.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A018) Failed by voice vote.
